mdRecord.dcterms:title: På Bjerget (On the Hill) Buildings, exterior

mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Facade to the east of the church

Complex of buildings designed in the same style as Grundtvig’s Church and intended to enhance its visual impact. Buildings contain the parish hall and apartments. Designed by Jensen-Klint in collaboration with Vilhelm Wittrup, Charles J. Schou and Georg Gøssel. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grundtvig%27s_Church [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
multiple dwellings
Grundtvig, N. F. S. (Nicolai Frederik Severin), 1783-1872
